website_summaries.verdict: A flawless blend of juicy and creamy sauce with bite-sized pieces of tender tuna and chicken makes for a treat your cat won't be able to resist.
pros: The first three ingredients are water, chicken, and tuna
Chunky stew-like texture with soft meat bits
cons: This one is 14 calories per pouch, so treat sparingly

customer_reviews.title: Please refund my money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tuna and shrimp flavor and ordered the 8- 4 packs for $24. I received one 4 pack of senior chicken flavor. I want my money back. No way does one pack of this stuff cost $24.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wise

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this broth!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has turned into an adorable nuisance since we discovered this product. We were feeding her strictly dry food, with dry treats. But then she got pancreatitis. She was so sick, spent 5 days in the hospital. So we got this product to try to put weight on her. We later added canned wet food. She instantly fell in love with this broth. We gave her one every day at lunch, she begs so much that now it’s breakfast :). All of the flavors are loved equally. It does look like a quality product, chunks or real food and a nice thick gravy covering it. It was a great find on our part, Bella’s too!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Will not stop subscription no matter how I begged 2 stop
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I asked to cancil this item because my 27 year old cat died--they KEEP sending. Begged them 2 stop because everytime it shows up, it breaks my heart. Reminds me of my Siamese whom I lost
customer_reviews.author: Gerry B. Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Elderly cat with sensitive stomach loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: We inherited an elderly cat when a friend went to the nursing home and he had a terrible vomiting problem. The vet had ordered special diet products but nothing helped. After trying several kinds of cat food we finally found that the cat can eat these treats without vomiting!!! So he gets a little Meow Mix and a packet of these treats daily and is doing fine. We ran out and the automatic refill supply wasn't due for 5 more days and the cat liked to drive us crazy. We won't let him run out of these treats again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat. H

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. My hyperthyroid 17 year old former feral cat would not even touch it. One of my other cats licked it up and vomited right after. I think the packaging cost 10 times more than the actual food. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: High percentage of protein....
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very fussy about what he eats, will not eat any meat from table and only one flavor of food. Got this for him in hopes he would eat it to get extra protein and no matter what I do iwth the food, he will not go near the dish, will not even smell it, he just seems to know it is different and I only put a tiny amt. in a dish for him with his food that he eats and had to throw everything out as he would not touch even the food he likes. It is not the manufactures fault I am sure, but the smell was not favorable to him and that is that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 year old cat. Recently, she has had some trouble eating her food. I bought her these packets and she loved them. Before she was only eating the gravy of her old food. With this food, she is able to eat everything on her plate. She loves it. I would highly recommend it. I will definitely be getting more of this for her in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Smelt and looked gross
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to preview some of these products prior to buyers purchasing low quality or unfit for comsumption items. these were disgusting. Smelt like vomit and my cats refused to eat them. i have had Prime membership for several years now. i have grown increasingly disappointed with the lack of qualtity of several items and the lack of help and comuniction with Amazon and their sellers
customer_reviews.author: Shari J. Merkle

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats that won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My beloved, geriatric cat was in renal failure for a couple of years. There is no cure for CRF, but it IS often manageable - and we did everything in our power to buy him extra, QUALITY time. We only discovered Hartz Lickables towards the end, but these highly palatable treats were a wonderful way to sneak in extra fluids/calories (especially the senior varieties!). In his final weeks, Hartz Stew Lickables were the ONLY thing he'd reliably consume, and he'd do so eagerly. So, thanks, Hartz, for buying us precious extra time. We finally had to set our sweet furbaby free of his failing body, but we'd have lost him sooner without you.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old cat with Lyme Disease. Her health has been failing & she has no appetite. I had to switch her to grain free food, which she is resisting. However, if I mix this stew with her food she loves it & does eat. The vitamins in this product have improved the texture of her fur as well. I have been adding this to her wet food for several months. She has not had any adverse effects (i.e. vomiting). I recommend this stew if your cat needs vitamins, as a treat or to mix in with regular wet food.
customer_reviews.author: M. AllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My senior cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior kitties ( 17 yrs old & 13 yrs old) from the shelter and want their lives to be happy, safe and secure for their remaining time. They love these treats so much that around 7pm they'll start coming around the kitchen as a "queue" to their human that it's time for their nightly treats. I also give them the "Bisque" flavor and switch it up for them. They love this so much it's eaten within a minute or less. I also use the stew to place a few drops of salmon oil and mix in with it to hide that taste (as they won't take the salmon oil alone) and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: TM53

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate package for product my cat loves
customer_reviews.text: I hate these plastic pouches. Part of the product ends up in the plastic bag. There is no way to recycle the plastic. A waste all the way around. Unfortunately most of the soup type products for cats come in these wasteful pouches so I feel stuck. On the other hand, my increasingly fussy cat does eat this product. He's old. I'm old. I don't have the ability to make something like this from scratch, so I'm rather stuck for now until I find an alternative that is less wasteful
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: My senior cat with Kidney issues- Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior cat that has kidney issues and she Loves this food. I feed it to her more often then they say to, but she loves them and it ensures she gets enough moisture since she doesn't drink water as often as I wish she would. It is so much cheaper then the kidney food the vet wanted me to put her on and have the same nutrition that those cans have in them! Today blood work came back and her BUN had dropped from 50 to 45 !!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Stimulated my CH cat’s appetite!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is two and has cerebellar hypoplasia. When I adopted her, I was having trouble stimulating her appetite, and my vet thought this may be a concern with ch. But, luckily, she loves these treats as well as the chowder variety. Not only did she have a full tube in one sitting, but it stimulated her appetite enough that she ate twice as much of her dry food in a day. Before giving her these treats, she ate maybe 1/4 of dry food a day and wouldn’t eat her wet food. Now, she eats all of it and has more energy. I’m so thankful for your product.
customer_reviews.author: April L Smitley

customer_reviews.title: The cat lovessss this treat
customer_reviews.text: The cat prefers Bisque. I mean really prefers it. About rips the package out of my hands when I am serving it to her. I personally prefer it, because it is very tidy, and not wasteful. My cat only licked the gravy off of canned cat food, and I would have to throw it away. This package, I cut a tiny corner and squeeze out a third of the package and seal it with a metal clip. Keeps it fresh, I remove the clip and squeeze out another serving. It's Meany Chili Beanie's favorite food. I also feed her Temptation treats and Meow Mix.
customer_reviews.author: Bee On Thyme

customer_reviews.title: Great filler treat, cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Picky kitten wouldn't eat much and I tried these ABC's she went nuts. The chicken she will gobble up the entire thing and then seems full. A great filler snack. The tuna she eats about 3/4 of the tube happilly then seemed disinterested. I don't care for the smell but she loves it and that's really what matters. She will eat these but not so much the same product in the pouches which is odd.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: If your cat likes the “gravy” in wet cat food, they will LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these - & she is very picky! Any wet food we have ever tried she turned her nose up too. The only thing I could get her to eat was sometimes the “gravy” out of a can of food, but she never ate the meat. This is basically like watered-down puréed cat food, very much a smooth “gravy” consistency with no chunks. The pouches are small, not the amount you get in a whole can of food. This price is a little cheaper than buying them for $1 per pouch In the store.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Something's Wrong
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these when I buy them from the store as a special treat. I ordered a box of them thinking I would save a little bit of money and time. As I was opening the first packet, my cat was excited because she recognized what she was getting. I put it on a plate, she sniffed it, looked at me with a surprised look on her face and walked away. Hmmm...what's up? So I opened up another one in a bit and she was again anticipating her special treat. She sniffed it and walked away. This just doesn't happen! Will not be ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odin loves them
customer_reviews.text: Odin,my cat, absolutely loves these. He recognizes the package and his mouth actually waters waiting for me to open one. He even has begun to head butt me around 5 every evening and then sits by them waiting as patiently as he can for me to catch up. I mean I squeeze them, he licks them then I have to get every last drop out on my finger while he looks away then I say here and he licks the last bit off my finger and looks at me like I just gave him the best ever treat. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: justhea

customer_reviews.title: LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this product. He starts to purr when he knows he is going to get one. My daughter likes feeding him slowly from the stick. I prefer just to squeeze it in his food bowl. At dinner he gets his own dinner and dessert. He eats dessert first of course. I caution not to feed too many to your kitty. On his birthday we splurged and he ate 3 throughout the day. That was too much and he ended up with loose stools the next day. Like anything, moderation.
customer_reviews.author: looking for a good deal

customer_reviews.title: My super picky cats LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I give my cats a little wet food every morning, and in most cases they lick the liquid and leave the chunks untouched. So I was looking for something with more or only liquid but healthy nourishing. Man, do they love this thing! They lick-clean their bowls! My only complaint, as someone already mentioned, is the really annoying packaging, which doesn't allow you to fully empty the bag, and it's just a waste of money and few more drops that my babies would enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Neta G.

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with this food! Our 14 year old cat suddenly stopped eating and we tried all sorts of different cat food for her. She seemed to like the ones with gravy so we went on a search for foods with more gravy than food, and then after quite a few failures I stumbled across this food. She absolutely loves it, although she still refuses to eat the small bits in it. She loves the gravy so I have started to strain it and mix a few slivers of the meat in, in hopes of her eating that also. I will keep buying this for her and am happy to do so!!
customer_reviews.author: sheart

customer_reviews.title: Bailey, 16 yrs, loves it
customer_reviews.text: Like able cat treat. Bailey, our 16 year old cat, loves these. I squeeze onto her treat plate after dinner. She waits for it. Bailey was a wild cat. I’ve had since she was about 8 weeks. I still can’t touch her. She just will it be held. Something to being a feral cat. Anyway a bit particular with food and treats. This is approved. And best part, she tolerates it well. No throw up, like on some wet foods. She likes both flavors.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our Kitties Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We have two senior cats (15 yrs old) and an 8 mos. old kitten. One senior is fat, one is very thin with a poor appetite. Wow, do all three love this stuff! I put it on top of their other wet food and that way our thin senior will eat better. Biggest drawback (other than the smell -- I don't like it, but I'm not the one eating it!) is those darned pouches. I use scissors to open them, it's hard to get the food out of the bottom and believe me, for the price I don't want to waste a smidgen of it.
customer_reviews.author: Fig Newton

customer_reviews.title: Senior cat must have!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 21 year old cat would live on these if I let him. He's never liked to drink water, and has always been on a wet food diet, but as he has aged he's become pickier. I use these to supplement his liquid intake. He will never refuse one and will push the box off the counter to get my attention when he wants another one. If you have a cat who needs more water, or a senior cat who is aging, I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2autistic

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these for a treat! They try to eat the package as the treat is being squeezed out, they are so greedy for more! I also like the version for senior cats, they seem to like it just as much! Great for when you need to get kitty to eat something, during sickness and recovery, and just anytime they deserve a treat or a small snack! I was also able to lure a stray kitten with these squeeze-ups - he loves them and is now in rescue waiting for a furever home.
customer_reviews.author: PJBLargo

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I first looked for this product because I saw a cat on Instagram that was eating them and thought it was kinda cool. When I found them in a town near by I got a pack just to see if my 2 (one of which is very picky) cats would eat them. I'll tell you right now, they love it more than cat nip. I open the drawer I have them hidden in and the come running. Trying to open them is fun because they want it so bad, they're trying to take it out of my hand before I can open it. I keep buying them this just because they're so happy when they get one.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: After just two envelopes of this 18 envelope package, I had to toss the rest as they made my 4 yr. old cat vomit each time.
customer_reviews.author: mlm

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea
customer_reviews.text: I really found it so neat that the delectables are in yogurt-like pouches. The pictures on the box clearly show how you can serve the tube directly to the cat, on top of food, or directly into a bowl. My cat really enjoyed this treat. I fed it to him directly from the tube first then put it on top of his moist food. He LOVED It!! This is really a cute and practical idea of a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The treat they come running for
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this treat. I first discovered it a couple of months ago. I don't know first hand but evidently it has the perfect smell and taste that they love. It came fast and the price is better than I get at the stores. I guess there are a number of way to give it to your cat. I have 2 male cats and I squeeze the packet onto a plate and add a little warm water to make a thick warm gravy and they absolutely love both the chicken and tuna flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the princesses standards I guess
customer_reviews.text: My cat simply won't eat these. She didn't just ignore it, she looked at me like I was trying to poison her and ran out of the kitchen. Now, if she sees me opening a pouch that she DOES like, she thinks it's the evil one and runs away. Seriously, I'm sure some cats like it, but who knows until you try it on your own little weirdo.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if pet unable to have solid food!
customer_reviews.text: We have a winner. OMG so glad I found this stuff. They delivered same day too.....yay! This makes it so easy to mix the meds in for Chewy. ( All back teeth extracted and in pain) He just licks it all right up too. He loves it! He is still in pain. My poor baby. He eats the whole packet right up, so he is getting some food in him to make him stronger.
customer_reviews.author: fearless1

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. He does not like to eat any wet food, and I mean ANY. So I had to find something that would give him some additional moisture in his diet. He gets most of his nutrients from his high quality dry food. These add the B and E vitamins that help him thrive and live his best life. I take a packet and a little water and he gobbles it right up. I hope one day someone will make a high quality gravy based cat food that he’ll actually eat.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: As written by the cat
customer_reviews.text: Meow, this food is the best that my tenants feed me. While they pay for my house and bills, I have to prove to them that my needs are met. They have tried to feed me other types of wet food, but this is the only one I like. It makes them happy that I don’t give it back to them on the floors or shoes. If only there were an unlimited supply to keep me happy. Meow
customer_reviews.author: alittlebitofeverything

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for leftover food for cats who love gravy
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE gravy and lick it off almost every food I give them, leaving bits of dry food in the bowl. I use a package to share between their two bowls and mix these "treats" with the leftover bits. Sure enough, the bisque and the bits disappear. Works well and I feel like we're not wasting food. I will say that it's soften hard to get all the bisque out of the package, but at least it's not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: eskc

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats, and they barely tolerate being near each other, so my wife decided to use these cat treats as a way to try to help them get along better. Each day, she feeds one tube to them, alternating back and forth, a little at a time. They love it! So much so that they gladly sit within inches of each other, politely waiting 5 or 10 seconds until it's their turn to have some squeezed out so they can lick it. I can definitely say that it has contributed greatly to lowering their stress level with each other, and that makes it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Tiss

customer_reviews.title: My cat is obsessed with this food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with this food! I've had her about 18 months now and finding something she really liked was tough at first, but she's been enjoying this for at least a year now. I always top her packet off with a little extra water too. I've noticed her fur looks much healthier this winter than it did last year since she has a better intake of fluid with this food and water intake. This food plus a cat water fountain and you'll have a happy kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin M Fisher

customer_reviews.title: For my toothless geriatric cat
customer_reviews.text: Poor Derek has most of his teeth removed and this product is one of the few that he will eat. Actually my other two love it too. I squeeze it on to a plate and he laps it up faster than you can say "Hartz Cat Treat". Issue is that its very expensive but I don't know how long he will be around so I want him to enjoy what time he has left so if it makes him happy I will scrimp somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: Only one flavor is liked by my cats, making Half the package a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love only one of these flavors, and my finicky cat will actually eat her dinner if some of this is mixed in. But since they don’t like both flavors, It’s a waste of money for me to keep buying it if I have to throw away the flavor they don’t like. Please consider packaging one flavor per package so I can keep buying the one they like.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Was good ... and then it wasn't... Sad face
customer_reviews.text: I feed these Hartz Delectables Stew Lickable Wet cat treats, to my 3-year old indoor/outdoor male cat Mister Bitsy. But not everyday anymore, as I've noticed this most recent supply has given my cat bad gas. Had been feeding him this treat for about the last six months at lunchtime, was doing fine on it. But this last shipment thru Amazon's subscribe and save program, I don't know, but it's caused my cat gas within minutes of ingesting. Maybe it was a bad batch?? That's why the 4 star rating instead of 5 stars. And also after this, will give this product a break, until I find something better for my cats digestive/ carnivore needs.
customer_reviews.author: GamieTiaBettita

customer_reviews.title: 2 Cat Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I split one pouch every morning between my 2 cats, they LOVE it! When I used to give them a small can of cat food every morning they always left some in the dish, of course the dog didnt mind at all ...lol but she gets her own half can of dog food in the morning. That is how my animals start the day, then its dry food for the rest of the day if they are hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat's favorite treat! and that says a lot. My cat is a spoiled princess and I have tried to give her everything from fresh atlantic salmon to bacon to quail eggs to a ridiculous number of treats bought on Amazon and chewy. But her favorite treat remains the Delectables squeezeups. Not sure what they put in these but my otherwise finkcky cat goes crazy for these.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rast

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: my cats love the bisque so I thought I'd try this. I split one between the two of them in the morning. The bisque they love. This treat however is more of a paste texture. One cat will eat it, one cat won't. The TOTAL out of the squeeze tube is about a tablespoon AT BEST so I don't feel at all that I'm getting the value for the cost. I will stick to the bisque which is about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY ANTONELLI

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.text: Cat goes nuts over this and it's cheaper on Amazon than it is in stores. However, it's still way too expensive for what you get. My cat is living the last of his years though as he is 19. I want to make sure he enjoys it as much as possible because he sometimes has stomach issues but this always gets eaten and never puked up. So I buy it to make him happy but sure wish the price tag was more affordable! So lost one star due to price.
customer_reviews.author: MistreatedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cats like them, pouches are too big
customer_reviews.text: These are the only "treats" that my cats like. They know where they are in the pantry and will stare at the shelf and cry. This is the first time I've ordered the pouches instead of the tubes, and I like the tubes much better. I don't give them a whole pouch in one serving, and it gets crusty and messy when I try to save it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: My 2 picky cats live this stuff , put on top of regular food
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats are getting so picky I don’t know what else to feed them!!! I buy regular Sheba pate and put this on top & they eat it all up!! Otherwise half the food stays ... They LOVE this food. I found this when I had my 19 YO cat & this is what helped keep her alive for another year - the senior has added vitamins
customer_reviews.author: sandra r

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitty loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I got up this morning, after my husband had fed our kitty, noticing she hadn't touched her regular food. She had been waiting for this treat and didn't want to spoil her appetite. She absolutely loves this. The price is higher than I would hope, but I did find basically the same thing with twice the servings, so we'll see if she loves that as much.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Garlinghouse

customer_reviews.title: cat rejected.
customer_reviews.text: my cat would just smell this and would not touch. I also put some out for a stray, he did not touch either.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Huckabee

customer_reviews.title: very expensive for what is in the pouch.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and that is what matters. However, he is an older cat and he is hungry after one pouch. 1.4 oz is not enough for him. His canned food, Earthborne is 5.5 ounces for $1.59, that's quite a difference in price and much more healthy food. But...he likes to have a change just like anyone else. This stuff is 3 times the price of the healthy food. In stores $1.00 a pouch, here we save a few cents. So, in conclusion, the cat likes it but if he had a choice he would eat 6 pouches a day. We just can't do that. Wish the price was less and the pouch held more.
customer_reviews.author: Gini M Haines

customer_reviews.title: helpful for kitty meds
customer_reviews.text: for those who dont want to shove a pill down a scratching, biting cat's throat, this is for you! Crush your pills...they like them up in no time. However, the ones with chucked tuna and chicken dont seem to appeal as much to our cats. Age and teeth perhaps? but the chunks are left behind. Like the added vitamins for older cats!
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Review by Anza the Kitten
customer_reviews.text: My human got this for me as a special treat. I like it a lot and lick it up very fast. My very old friend cat whose name is Grace also likes it. She is old and does not like to do anything but lick her food. Overall we are very well-pleased with this and think you should buy it for your own cats. Thank you. Sincerely, Anza the kitten
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE Squeeze Ups!
customer_reviews.text: When I get one of these little tubes out I immediately find myself surrounded by all 4 furbabies. They take turns, mostly, but they sure are disappointed when it's gone. You do have to be a little careful not to squeeze too much at once to avoid drips, though your cats will probably clean up any drips for you rather quickly. 4 paws up in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Saves money, add hot water to make it go further
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old cat that I adopted at 15 decided he will only eat these now...5 times a day. I wish they made them bigger but I had some hot water to the packet and stir it up well. This helps it make it more of a meal for him. He doesn’t like the chicken pieces but my stray Russian Blue that muscled his way into my house and life eats the left overs. I’m a sucker for the Ancient Vampire Kitty si what Jack Sparrow wants, Jack Sparrow gets. This is a good deal, saving me a trip to the store, about $2 per pack and not all stores have the Senior formula.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Nyx

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes
customer_reviews.text: My cat liked this treat but didn't go absolutely bonkers for it. Also, the push up sleeve is made up of some type of foil, so it did cross my mind that it could cut my cat's tongue as she was licking the tube. I wish they would have more poultry-only flavors because she doesn't like seafood flavor that much. However, it did make it easier for me to give her her meds because she was involved with eating, so based on that, I'll probably get this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle333

customer_reviews.title: My cat craves this!
customer_reviews.text: Found this while searching for a "saucy" treat for my picky cats. It looks and smells like chicken pot pie without the pie! I have to squeeze every ounce out of the envelope as my cats can't seem to get enough of this stew. Oddly, they wouldn't even eat any of the other flavors, just the Senior 10. Hey, they're cats! On the downside, these are hard to find in the stores and are very expensive for the small amount you get. Still, when your cat likes something, you find it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food for senior cats
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat can't chew so well, and she was very happy when I discovered these pouches. She loves them, her favorite is the bisque tuna. The lickable flavors have small chunks of meat or tuna, while the bisque flavors are completely pureed. They are pricey, so I give her one every other day, in addition to her soft kibble.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: OVER PRICED for very little serving!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Way overpriced for the little bit that’s in each packet. No enticing scent for my cat. Will stick with my Whiskas Choice Cuts with Gravy packets. You can buy 24 of them at Walmart for the price of this 12 pack of Hartz. And my cat loves the gravy in Whiskas.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boden

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say they are the best because they are already impossible to find now! I Order them everytime I see them in stock. My cat is addicted. MAJOR Addicted!!!! She cries for them and if I try to feed her anything else she looks at me waiting on the tube to come out. They are great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Churu tubes for them, but found these were cheaper, so I began buying these. My cats go nuts for these. This is their favorite treat of all time. If I would feed them 10 a day, they would eat them. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a treat that their cat would love.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Clark

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these. She actually starts licking her "lips" when she sees me pull out a packet. These are great treats for her because she doesn't have any teeth. All she has to do is lick them up and enjoy. I also mix a package in with her food to make it easier for her to eat. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: JoanneG

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves her Lickables. Funny... review question asked about the taste... personally I wouldn't know, but she hasn't complained.... Jumps up on counter watching me prepare it (I add a little warm water to it). Finishes the whole portion in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: David Camisa

customer_reviews.title: My cats go crazy for these!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I've never had a treat for my cats they go crazy for. The moment I open the drawer where I store these, they know. They push each other out of the way just to get to this. It's a sight to behold. I'm careful not to give these to them too much but it's a great treat once or twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my cat with kidney disease gain weight!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has kidney disease and I’ve tried a few lickable treats to get him to gain weight and this is the only one that got more than a sniff! My cat went crazy for this stuff and has gained a pound after a week of giving him one daily. The protein levels are low enough that this is a great treat for kidney disease cats. Super satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M.

customer_reviews.title: 8 month old kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten (that regurgitates beef and doesn't eat chicken or turkey at all) loves only seafood. The little boy doesn't like pate or any kind of solid treats be temptation or party mix treats. He has recently gotten bored of purina fancy feast gravy of salmon, tune and seafood mix. He welcomed and loved this bisque that's meant for aged cats. We feed him about 4 packets daily. Quite expensive for the price and quantity. Would love to purchase this in bulk should the prices go down.
customer_reviews.author: Raya

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this! 🐱
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! 🐱 Think he just may be addicted to it! lol 😁 He's usually pretty finicky, but he gulps this down in seconds and demands more! It's kinda expensive, since you don't get much in each pouch. But most things I buy I end up throwing out because he refuses to eat it. So when I find something he likes I have to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa 🐱

customer_reviews.title: Loved by even picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: All three of our cats adore these treats. They beg for them! Easy to squeeze out of the tube. We use them as treats by themselves. Could also be used on top of other food to entice picky eaters. Our cats like both the chicken and tuna flavors. Wish there are a better discount for buying in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy  EV

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your cat...
customer_reviews.text: Not a hit for my kitties. They have odd little grainy bits in them — not a smooth texture. Same ingredient starts all flavors — chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Thikacat

customer_reviews.title: Cat soup, anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I found this "cat soup" by chance when getting regular crunchies for my (then) elderly kitty, so I bought a few figuring that the more he ate and drank the better. Wow! He, and the cat I still have, love(d) it! I give it as a treat in addition to regular food, a whole packet in a small bowl. Kitty comes running when she hears the door of the bread box where I hide them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Barely any food in this packet
customer_reviews.text: My cat who was ill and had no appetite so I didn’t want bought when th the gravy she’d like this. For one day she ate this up and because there’s like a teaspoon of food in this overpriced dollar a packet meal I ordered the12 pack. Of course, when it arrived she didn’t want it anymore. I wouldn’t even mind the price if there was my moneys worth in product, which sad to say there is not and is a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: It's Literally Nothing
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing but goo, NOT CAT FOOD. BUY your cat something to sink the teeth into like Temptation's treats. This sucks, and it's non-returnable, so I wanted money. Try Sheba brand roasted chicken portions, real meat and gravy if you want extra goo, and kitties really like it.
customer_reviews.author: TESSA PENDRAGON

customer_reviews.title: Hartz Delectable
customer_reviews.text: It is kind of pricey for 12 separate pouches. My cats are true in the sense finicky eaters. We have tried every brand from Sh*b@ to Fr!5k!€5 and the Delectables are a winner! If you cat no matter the age is ruler of your house then I recommend you please your King or Queen with this.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat normally eats something for a week, then turns her nose up at it, but she's been eating this for a few months now. It's very moist, which is good for getting that liquid volume that house cats need. I'm very pleased by the scent, it's subtle and mild. The fold at the bottom of the package is a bit of a nuisance, though, so I use a butter knife to get all the yummy goo out. It's only 14 calories per pack, so you still need to provide your cat with a base diet, but this stuff is just great.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves the the gravy!
customer_reviews.text: Review is asking me to rate “scent & flavor”. Cat won’t answer me & I’m not gonna try it. My cat loves these. She doesn’t always eat all the meat but loves the gravy. I try to break up the meat in the pouch before I open it, then she eats a bit more of it. I add a small amount of hot water & stir it in so she gets more gravy & it’s a little wam. Spoiled!!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa valentine

customer_reviews.title: Always read reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Are not what I thought, Size is a tube , like stated but Pictures are Deceiving... I have to give my cat 4 of these to One of the Larger Packet that is pictured in Review Photos , my Fault for not Reading the Reviews ... :( Other than that my cat loves these♥️
customer_reviews.author: Nailgirl

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it. Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only wet cat food my senior cat will eat. It smells delicious and looks appetizing. My cat ate his last meal yesterday, but thank you Amazon delivery, his food was delivered a day early. In this time of covid-19 stay at home, I am more grateful than ever for Amazon's consistent delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Cockatiels R Us

customer_reviews.title: One of the pickiest!
customer_reviews.text: I know cats are known to be finicky but I have one of the pickiest yet! He is partial to the bisque pouches but licks up the gravy in the others while his brother finishes the meatier pieces. (I'm sure he would like the pouches to be larger but probably doesn't need any more than this.) This product is a great value and keeps them happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: NeatFreak

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and when it arrived I was missing some of the order, someone counted wrong lol..... but I called Amazon and Amazon took care of me so I'm happy with the order. My cat's absolutely adore this treat. It is the only way I can get my cat to take her antibiotics is mixing with this treat so it's A lifesaver instead of trying to shove pills down her throat I just open the capsule and mix with this treat. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: AshLJ

customer_reviews.title: My cats go crazy over these
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love these so much. They literally meow like crazy as I’m opening them up because they’re so excited. I personally put them each on a little cat tray/dish, but you can also hand feed them to them. Totally awesome- my local Meijer is almost always sold out so I have been buying them off amazon and am pleased, as are my kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Rescue tool. SNACK PARTY!!
customer_reviews.text: This stray/semi feral cat was coaxed into our lives using these feeding tubes - then they became our "go to" tool to introduce her to our dog while still outside (for 2 years) and now all 3 of our cats and 1 dog share a tube patiently taking turns. This is a miracle recipe I hope you all don't go buying up so there is none left for our tribe but certainly too good to not brag about.
customer_reviews.author: Drranjack

customer_reviews.title: My Cat LOVES This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely LOVES this stuff. The minute he hears me opening the cabinet door, he's right there meowing. It is a great price for 12 pouches. The pouches are easy to open. I put the product in a little dish for him. PROS: Great Value Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great way to plump up a picky cat!
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky cat who always has access to all the food he could want but became a bit thin because we moved and he got stressed. He is large and very active which doesn’t help. He needed to gain weight. I gave him this every day at noon and now he is looking plumper again.
customer_reviews.author: Dani P.

customer_reviews.title: Cat in did not like half of the flavors
customer_reviews.text: This package includes two flavors. One of which my cat does not like so there goes six packages of unused cat food. On top of that do not like the packaging is very difficult to scoop the food out. I would not buy again as my cat in like half of the items
customer_reviews.author: A fabulous shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty snack!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these from Walmart while grocery shopping but I'm glad Amazon carries it because not only do my cats go gaga for it, but it's helped one of my cats start to regain weight and appetite after loosing an unhealthy amount in the last couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: QueenLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Meow meow moew
customer_reviews.text: My cat really really loves these. My cats seem to love the soupier options when it comes to desserts/snack. This gel like texture and bits of meat they love. This is one of them and I hope they never stop making these. I think it's a great portion size and the cats go crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Browbruja

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack
customer_reviews.text: wth is in this stuff??? I ran out recently and had to order 1 day delivery because I got harassed so hard by my cats I couldn't get any work done. They are hooked on this stuff... and go through it very quickly. It isn't a meal replacement just a snack. My cats are addicts now...
customer_reviews.author: Riven

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack!!
customer_reviews.text: This is kitty crack.y cat goes batty over these. No matter what flavor I pick out. She's very picky about all the rest of her treats/food. She normally turns her nose up at any brand of wet canned food. She can't wait for me to open the individual packages of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT a variety pack
customer_reviews.text: The description says it’s a variety pack of 3 different flavors but I only got one flavor. I needed the variety for my picky cat and now she won’t eat it at all. Not eligible for return either. Buyer beware. I’m giving 1 star for false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: we didn't think we'd ever manage to get him to eat anything that third meal (he was great at taking pills with his food)
customer_reviews.text: When we found out our cat with heart failure would have to take pills THREE TIMES a day, we didn't think we'd ever manage to get him to eat anything that third meal (he was great at taking pills with his food). But, even if he filled up on his usual two cans of food... he always had room for this for a late-night snack (with salix sprinkled on it, but don't tell him!). Great for old cats with low appetites, it's mostly just gravy, more a treat than a real meal, but if it's all your cat has appetite for... :D
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: My cat love it
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old cat had a tooth problem and he refused to eat almost everything. I bought these in hope's he would eat them. Precious love them. I mixed them with his dry cat food the night before so it would be soft enough to eat. Thankfully he loved it and gained back the weight he lost. The tooth is now gone, but I give him some everyday. The reason for the low star's is the cost. I can by them here at a store for 50%-75% cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Enough may not be enough for your cats .
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the scent or getting it on my hands . The cats that I have are wild about them . When ever I go to fix myself a meal . They have me put some on their food . Then butt my hand in hopes it will cause me to pour it on instead of dribble it on their food .
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Yummy in my kitties tummy
customer_reviews.text: My cat Lucie just loves these. She is obsessed as well as picky as all heck. I’m glad I found a nice treat she can enjoy. The price is also a bit cheaper that I tend to find at the store. Will be stocking up on these so I make sure to not run out.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie Renee

customer_reviews.title: WOW! My 8 year old American Bobtail
customer_reviews.text: Could not resist these. She lost her mind when these were all gone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not a big hit here
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 - 2.5 year old cats have become rather fussy so someone suggested we try these. One cat sniffed and walked away, the other lapped up the juice and left all the chunks. - would not buy again, plus its messy and not much in each packet.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this better than canned cat food. Easy open pouch, my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat canned cat food so I tried this. She now is sitting waiting at the food closet in the morning just waiting for her bisque pouch. She still will not eat canned cat food, so if you have a finicky cat I suggest this. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: my picky cats like this
customer_reviews.text: My cats don't like wet foods with chunks so this was great for them. It's smoother in consistency. My cats are senior cats but they enjoy this anyway. I wish they came in a squeeze tube so my hands wouldn't get messy while squeezing this out.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cat approves
customer_reviews.text: I started getting these when my cat had dental surgery and needed something soft to slurp up. He likes them so much I keep getting them as an occasional treat. It's a good incentivizer for actually finishing a half full bowl of food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present gir my two cats. They absolutely love these and fight each other to lick it up rapidly. One of my cats has a very sensitive stomach and she has had no signs of stomach upset. It makes me so happy to see them enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Cats love em!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! It's so hard to find them though so I have to buy them online and it gets expensive. I wish they were packaged a bit better so they used less plastic - that is very wasteful. Also my husband hates the smell of these so thats why I rated it 1/5 for scent haha
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra T.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My senior kitty loves it!! Hes so picky. I've struggled with him liking anything. He's took a liking to the dogs food, instead of his. So figured I'd give this a try. We're on our 2nd box. If you have picky eaters, id recommend.
customer_reviews.author: xON3OFAK1NDx

customer_reviews.title: My cats would say 5 stars across the board!
customer_reviews.text: We call these packages "kitty crack" as the cats are hooked on them as if they are crack! One packet split between 3 cats is okay, but each cat would easily suck down an entire tube if allowed. These things do STINK, but I guarantee the cats love that stink.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon D Leszczynski

product_meta.title: Hartz Lickable Wet Cat Treats
product_meta.description: Size:12 Pack| Color:Tuna & WhitefishSearching for a treat your favorite feline can’t resist? Look no further. Delectable is the first gourmet lockable treat to combine tender, real chicken and succulent, plump fish in three purr worthy textures: bisque (smooth), Stew (hearty) and Chowder (creamy). each recipe boasts nutritious and flavorful ingredients delectably blended for easy-to-lap eating with items for kitten, adult, and senior life stages. The unique consistency, combined with our superior palatability technology, makes delectable lockable treats so delicious cats lick the bowl clean! The perfectly sized 1.4 ounce Pouch is easy to open and pour for a quick snack or food topper to entice finicky eaters.
feature_bullets: Combines Succulent Tuna And Whitefish Shreds Delectably Blended Into A Smooth And Hearty Sauce For A Lickable Treat So Delicious Cats Lick The Bowl Clean
Delicious Wet Texture Allows Your Cat To Enjoy Fish, Meat And Juices Together, Rather Than Only Being Able To Lick The Sauce While Having To Leave The Meat Behind
To Serve, Hold Pouch At Top Edges With Both Hands And Shake Gently. Then, Tear Pouch Open And Squeeze The Sides To Widen The Opening. Pour The Treat Into Your Cat`S Dish And Watch It Disappear!
Your Frisky Feline Will Love Trying All Our Lip Smacking Varieties: Stew, Bisque, And Chowder, Which Include Items For Kittens And Senior Cats (10 Years+ And 15 Years+)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
